title: Llama-3 70b OMNI-complete: AUTO Improving AUTOcomplete Prompt for EVERYTHING (Groq)
description:
Unlock the Power of LLM Autocompletes: All you need is this PROMPT & LLAMA 3.

Writing autocomplete code is a challenge. Then you have to write it again and again as the business logic changes. üî• In this video, I'll show you how to harness the power of LLM Llama 3-70b with Groq to create an OmniComplete ‚Äì a self-improving, domain-agnostic autocomplete that works across ALL your tools and applications! ü§Ø

Imagine this: Your users start typing, and your OmniComplete instantly suggests relevant completions based on ALL previous user inputs AND your unique domain knowledge. ü§Ø No more rigid dropdowns or limited suggestions ‚Äì this is next-level LLM autocomplete!

Here's what you'll discover:
- The HUGE difference between traditional autocompletes and LLM-powered autocompletes ‚Äì and why LLMs are GAME-CHANGING!
- How LLM AutoCompletes self-improve with every use ‚Äì watch your autocomplete get smarter over time!
- Actionable insights from your users ‚Äì uncover what your audience REALLY cares about, directly from their autocomplete interactions!
- A simple yet POWERFUL prompt-centered architecture ‚Äì easily reuse your OmniComplete across different domains with minor prompt tweaks!
The complete codebase ‚Äì get up and running with your OWN OmniComplete today!

Plus, we'll dive deep into:
- Prompt engineering for autocompletion ‚Äì craft prompts that deliver spot-on suggestions.
- One-shot prompts ‚Äì get accurate completions with just a single example.
- Building a prompt-centered architecture ‚Äì design a system that revolves around your prompts for maximum flexibility and reusability.
- Prompt testing and validation ‚Äì ensure your OmniComplete is always delivering high-quality results.

Ready to supercharge your user experience with AI-powered autocomplete? üöÄ Hit that like button, subscribe, and let's build the future of autocomplete together!
